overview:
Marc is the CEO of Architizer.com.

In 2009 Marc and his partners founded Architizer.com, a revolution in the way architects communicate their work. Architizer is the the first crowd sourced database for architecture online. In the 18 months since its inception, Architizer has grown to over 25,000 projects and over 400,000 members and fans. It has started a fundamental reevaluation within the profession of how architecture is consumed, and remans the fastest growing platform for architecture online.

Marc is a registered architect and teaches at Columbia Universityâ€™s Graduate School of Architecture, Planning and Preservation, lectures on the topic of social media and architecture across the country and sits on the board of Goods for Good, a non profit serving the children of Malawi.
